trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage" /> adapter for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: für den Betrieb in einer gehosteten Umgebung.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: "Demand"-Wert: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Berechtigungswert: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter" /> class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Returns a list of any additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A list of any additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied.
trans-unit.target: Eine Liste der zusätzlichen HTTP-Header mit denen Zwischenspeichern variiert wird.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> classes inherit this property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> interface.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> und <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> Klassen erben diese Eigenschaft über die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IPageAdapter> Schnittstelle.

trans-unit.source: These implementations return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Diese Implementierungen zurückgeben `null`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Output Caching" section in [Mobile Text Writer Rendering Best Practices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28893297-2c45-4c57-a2b3-9cdd5898f988).
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen finden Sie im Abschnitt "Zwischenspeichern der Ausgabe" in [Mobile Text Writer Rendering Best Practices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28893297-2c45-4c57-a2b3-9cdd5898f988).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets persisted data between requests through the use of the URL query string.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Data persisted between requests through the use of the URL query string.
trans-unit.target: Daten, die zwischen Anforderungen durch die Verwendung der URL-Abfragezeichenfolge beibehalten werden.

trans-unit.source: This property is populated when a valid <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> type is configured as an attribute of the `< mobileControls >` configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Diese Eigenschaft wird aufgefüllt, wenn ein gültiger <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> wird als ein Attribut des konfiguriert die `< mobileControls >` Konfigurationselement.

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequest" /> object that contains request information, such as HTTP headers.
Source identifier for the event.
Argument identifier for the event.
Collection of postback data from the request object.
Called to determine the postback data collection.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The modified postback data collection.
Because some devices handle postback differently from others, this method allows the adapter to modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: Da einige Geräte Postback anders als andere behandeln, kann diese Methode den Adapter zum Ändern der Auflistung.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> implementations of this method gather control data if the post originated from a different page.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> und <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> Implementierungen dieser Methode sammeln gesteuert werden, wenn die Bereitstellung von einer anderen Seite stammt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter> implementation performs CHTML-specific handling of postback data.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter> Implementierung führt CHTML-spezifische Behandlung der Postbackdaten.

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="true" /> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Class
trans-unit.target: Klasse

trans-unit.source: Returns
trans-unit.target: Rückgabe

trans-unit.source: Preferred rendering type
trans-unit.target: Bevorzugte Renderingtyp

trans-unit.source: Check value of JavaScript property
trans-unit.target: Überprüfen Sie Wert des JavaScript-Eigenschaft

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.
trans-unit.target: Überprüft, ob der Wert der <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> Eigenschaft ist <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> oder <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> -Eigenschaft gibt `true`.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.
trans-unit.target: Überprüft, ob der Wert der <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> Eigenschaft ist <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> oder <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> -Eigenschaft gibt `false`.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> property is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.
trans-unit.target: Überprüft, ob der Wert der <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> Eigenschaft ist <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> oder <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Nicht zutreffend.

trans-unit.source: System exception object.
The text writer
Called if an unhandled exception occurs during the life cycle of the page.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.
An adapter can choose to handle the exception and render an error message.
trans-unit.target: Ein Adapter kann auswählen, um die Ausnahme behandeln und eine Fehlermeldung zu rendern.

trans-unit.source: The method returns `true` if it handles the error.
trans-unit.target: Gibt die Methode `true` , wenn es sich um den Fehler behandelt.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> class, this implementation does nothing and returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Für die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> Klasse diese Implementierung wird keine Aktion ausgeführt, und gibt `false`.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> class, this implementation formats the error for WML and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Für die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> Klasse diese Implementierung den Fehler für WML formatiert und gibt `true`.

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
Name of the event.
Returns <see langword="true" /> if it handles the exception.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
This method is called during postback.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird während des Postbacks aufgerufen.

trans-unit.source: It allows a page adapter to handle a postback event by itself.
trans-unit.target: Sie können einen Seitenadapter, ein Postbackereignis selbst zu behandeln.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter.HandlePagePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.HandlePagePostBackEvent%2A> methods return false.
trans-unit.target: Sowohl die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter.HandlePagePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> und <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.HandlePagePostBackEvent%2A> Methoden "false" zurückgeben.

trans-unit.source: Programmatic name of the form.
Returns whether or not the specified form is to be rendered as part of the current request.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified form is to be rendered as part of the current request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> class, only the active form is rendered for each request.
trans-unit.target: Für die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter> -Klasse, die nur das aktive Formular wird für jede Anforderung gerendert.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> class, multiple forms can be combined as cards into a single deck, if size permits.
trans-unit.target: Für die <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter> -Klasse, mehrere Formen können kombiniert werden als Karten in einem Stapel, wenn Größe zulässt.

trans-unit.source: Returns a page weight, based on the device's screen size, which is appropriate for the target device.
This property is used in form pagination.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A page weight, based on the device's screen size, which is appropriate for the target device.
trans-unit.target: Eine Seite-Gewichtung, basierend auf dem Gerät Bildschirmgröße, die für das Zielgerät geeignet ist.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage" /> to which the adapter is attached.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The page associated with the device adapter.
trans-unit.target: Die Seite, die dem Geräteadapter zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: Sets or returns whether items from the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary" /> property are persisted in the query string.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

<see langword="true" /> if items from the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary" /> property are persisted in the query string; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Wenn Elemente aus der <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter.CookielessDataDictionary" /> Eigenschaft werden dauerhaft in der Abfragezeichenfolge ist, andernfalls <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, this value is `true` if the `CookielessDataDictionaryType` entry in the `MobileControls` configuration section of Web.config is set to a valid dictionary type.
trans-unit.target: Standardmäßig ist dieser Wert `true` Wenn die `CookielessDataDictionaryType` Eintrag in der `MobileControls` Konfigurationsabschnitt der Datei "Web.config" auf einen gültigen Wörterbuchtyp festgelegt ist.

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The text writer.
The form to render.
Renders the given form.
This method is called by the form adapter.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Returns whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage" /> is rendering multiple forms as cards of the same deck.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="true" /> if the page is rendering multiple forms as cards of the same deck; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
